# u-text

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                 | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `color`     | `color`     | font color: string, e.g. '#e1e1e1', 'lightblue'. Default is '#fff' (white). | `string` | `'#fff'`    |
| `size`      | `size`      | font size: string, e.g. '12px', '1rem'. Default is '1rem'.                  | `string` | `'1rem'`    |
| `transform` | `transform` | text-transfrom: string, e.g. 'uppercase', 'lowercase'.                      | `string` | `undefined` |
| `weight`    | `weight`    | font weight: string, e.g. 'bold'. Default is 'normal'.                      | `string` | `'normal'`  |
